Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Campbell
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, California, Augusta, Western and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, California, Augusta, Western and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/123rd
ShortDescription: NB 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 124th, Lowe, 123rd and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/123rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 124th, Lowe, 123rd and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/123rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
